This guide provides step-by-step instructions to update the Clear Creek Adult EDI package with new redd data. 

## Navigating to the Repository
All data processing and EDI uploads are managed in the same repository.  
1. Navigate to the [project repository](https://github.com/FlowWest/jpe-clear-adult-edi) and clone it to your local machine.
